H0.text: The laburnum tree has what colour flowers. Pink

H1.text: The laburnum tree has what colour flowers. Purple

H2.text: The laburnum tree has what colour flowers. White

H3.text: The laburnum tree has what colour flowers. Yelow

A4.text: The yellow flowers are responsible for the old poetic name 'golden chain tree' (also written as golden chaintree or goldenchain tree).

A5.text: They have yellow pea-flowers in pendulous leafless racemes 10–40 cm (4–15+1⁄2 in) long in spring, which makes them very popular garden trees.

A6.text: The flowers are golden yellow, sweet scented, and typically bloom in May.
